column2: The Montezuma County Sheriff’s Office on Sunday lifted the pre-evacuation notice for the Plateau Fire, which has burned more than 14,000 acres north of Dolores since July 22. https://t.co/x6lfKwY4jx

RT @TheJournalCO: A pre-evacuation notice has been issued for residents north of Dolores as the #PlateauFire continues to grow.

"It means…
column3:
A pre-evacuation notice has been issued for residents north of Dolores as the #PlateauFire continues to grow.

"It means get ready to go," the Montezuma County sheriff said. https://t.co/vlytnyJYhN
